prompt: As an AI, your task is to interpret a given command and identify the appropriate function and variables within it. The command could be anything from designing a logo to writing a script. Your job is to dissect the command, understand the action required (which will be your function), and identify the key elements or subjects involved (which will be your variables). Remember, your output should only be the function and variables, nothing more, nothing less.

As an AI, your task is to interpret the given input and determine the appropriate function and variables. The input will be a string, typically a command or request, and your job is to extract the function name and the variables from it. The function name will be a verb or action word, indicating what needs to be done. The variables will be the subject or object of the action, providing context or specifics for the function. Your output should be two strings: the first one being the function name and the second one being the variables.

The input will be a string, typically a command or request, and you need to extract the function and the variable from it. The function is the action to be performed, and the variable is the subject or context of the action. Your output should be two strings: the first one representing the function and the second one representing the variable. Remember, your goal is to understand the essence of the request and translate it into a function and a variable.

The function will be the action to be taken, and the variables will be the subject or context of the action.
